<title level="1" right="Spell 1" pfs="Standard">[Synchronize](/Spells.aspx?ID=1013)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 135 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** touch

**Target** up to 5 willing creatures
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 24 hours
</row>

</column>

---

You harmlessly place your unique magic sigil, which is about 1 square inch in size, on your targets. When you Cast the Spell, you set the duration by choosing a time at which point the sigil flashes dimly three times. After that point, the spell ends. Even though spell durations aren't normally exact, the effects of _synchronize_ are precise to the second. The timer is based on the place where the spell was cast, so entering a plane or area where time flows differently changes how the time elapses.

---
**Heightened (2nd)** The spell can target up to 20 willing creatures.
